name: Acorn Frenzy
description:
Notes

This game is for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam. Sadly there is no sound... I didn't really feel like it. Let me know if you want a better sequel 

Instructions

Main: Use arrow keys to move and collect acorns.

 Day/Night: I know this was a mechanic from last year but at day time, the owl will be asleep. At night... The owl will be awake. When that hapens, be slow or duck other wise, the owl will chase you. If you get hit, you lose a life. If you lose all of them, the game is over and you will see how many acorns you got.
